description:
Join the efforts to save the world's bees population from colony collapse by studying the secret world of bees, as taught from the unique perspective of holistic Bio-dynamic beekeeper Hilmar Kuhnemann.

Gain practical knowledge that will allow you to start a bees colony right in your backyard, without causing any harm to the bees or their habitat.

All profits from selling the course are dedicated to further research and development of sustainable and environmentally friendly beekeeping practices.
title: Introduction to BioDynamic Beekeeping
